readability_reflection: I found string concatenation to be more readable, string interpolation is more confusing when it adds too many symbols.
comprehension_debugging: Yes, I found it to affect my ability to quickly understand or debug code snippets. It took me longer to debug in my head.
preference_rationale: string interpolation, the specific factor is its easier to see whats the expected output
learning_curve: prior familiarity or experience greatly helped with my ease of understanding the provided code examples
suggestions_improvement: Maybe color coded stuff to show that only certain colors are expected to output
